title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 803.15 - Manner of service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 803.15 - Manner of service

State Regulations

Service of any document upon any party may be made by
personal delivery of, or by mailing a copy of the document to the last known
address of the party. The hearing officer serving the document shall certify to
the manner and the date of the service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
803.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
